title: 'Disclosure Day,' Steven Spielberg's UFO movie that filmed scenes in South Jersey, releases first trailer
description: The first trailer came out Tuesday for Steven Spielberg's upcoming UFO movie 'Disclosure Day,' which filmed scenes in Cape May County in March. The summer blockbuster starring Emily Blunt is due out in theaters in June.

title: curious ufo 3
description: In this 1967 photo, Dr. David Deener and students conducted survey of student and community representatives on belief of flying saucers and attitudes toward space race. Do you believe in flying saucers are real? If you do, do you think...

title: curious ufo 2
description: In 1947, UFO sightings were rampant throughout Louisiana, particularly in the Alexandria area. So many people reported seeing disc-like objects in the sky that a national UFO convention was planned for Alexandria.

title: Steven Spielberg finally reveals 1st trailer for new UFO film 'Disclosure Day', and now we're terrified
description: Emily Blunt and Josh O'Connor star in Universal Pictures' eerie alien invasion project coming next summer.

title: curious ufo
description: Mystery still surrounds saucer-like lights snapped by Coast Guard in 1952. New Orleans is buzzing with talk about the "mystery object" spotted by a Coast Guard cutter just 200 miles south of the city in the Gulf of Mexico. What...
